page.title: 13SHEEPSCOMBE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is very small.There are 9 in the infant class and 16 in the junior class. We have a lot of help from our teachers because we are so few and also it is usually very quiet. We have many chances to play football, cricket and rounders but often there are not enough children to make a good team. When we acted a masque this term everyone had more than one role to play. We worry that if the school gets too small it will close. Joe likes doing English because it makes him think, and handwork because he can make good things. Iain likesmaths, English, science, drama and handwork. He says the best thing about school is tht you learn what you have to do in life, like when you have to make a hard decision you will know what to do.Everybody likes going swimming on Mondays at Gloucester.
